frontend.title: Frontend developer
frontend.content: I have experience creating reactive websites using reactjs/ts and nodejs.

fullstack.title: Fullstack engineer
fullstack.content: Can build a fullstack application using docker, kubernetes, nodejs, postgres and various other technologies. Ive worked on and created several backend services and frontend applications.

gamedev.title: Game dev
gamedev.content: Have built several small game projects using the Godot engine and C#.
